movie.title: Behind the Screen
movie.description_intro: Three movies are being shot simultaneously and Charlie is an overworked scene shifter. The foreman is waited on hand and foot until all the shifters but Charlie go on strike. A girl looking for work pretends to be a man and helps Charlie. Charlie discovers her gender and falls in love with her. The foreman thinks they are homosexual and in the ensuing fight they become involved in a long pie throwing scene from one of the movies in production. The frustrated workers dynamite the studio.
movie.description_full: Three movies are being shot simultaneously and Charlie is an overworked scene shifter. The foreman is waited on hand and foot until all the shifters but Charlie go on strike. A girl looking for work pretends to be a man and helps Charlie. Charlie discovers her gender and falls in love with her. The foreman thinks they are homosexual and in the ensuing fight they become involved in a long pie throwing scene from one of the movies in production. The frustrated workers dynamite the studio.

movies.title: Don't Let The Pigeon Do Storytime
movies.title_english: Don't Let The Pigeon Do Storytime
movies.title_long: Don't Let The Pigeon Do Storytime (2020)
movies.summary: A collection of live readings and sketch comedy inspired by Mo Willems' series of Pigeon books.
movies.description_full: A collection of live readings and sketch comedy inspired by Mo Willems' series of Pigeon books.
movies.synopsis: A collection of live readings and sketch comedy inspired by Mo Willems' series of Pigeon books.

movies.title: The Hunt
movies.summary: Lucas is a Kindergarten teacher who takes great care of his students. Unfortunately for him, young Klara has a run-away imagination and concocts a lie about her teacher. Before Lucas is even able to understand the consequences, he has become the outcast of the town. The hunt is on to prove his innocence before it's taken from him for good.

movies.title: Prowler
movies.summary: A man wrongfully accused of murder forms an unlikely partnership on his release and attempts to uncover the truth behind his wife's death...
movies.description_full: A man wrongfully accused of murder forms an unlikely partnership on his release and attempts to uncover the truth behind his wife's death...
movies.synopsis: A man wrongfully accused of murder forms an unlikely partnership on his release and attempts to uncover the truth behind his wife's death...

movies.title: Bad Boys for Life
movies.summary: Marcus and Mike have to confront new issues (career changes and midlife crises), as they join the newly created elite team AMMO of the Miami police department to take down the ruthless Armando Armas, the vicious leader of a Miami drug cartel.
